main event: Observers sighted a bright light west of their boat that would disappear and reappear.
interesting points: The light was described as being bigger than their boat., A nearly full moon was visible at the time of the sighting., There is insufficient data to conclusively identify the object., The sighting was probably a natural phenomenon., The object was last observed as of 13 Nov 69.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: Mr. and a Captain and First Mate on a boat
